column.documents-gap: Since your last visit, you missed {count} documents.

about.title: About AFP Deck
description: AFP News Deck is a reader for AFP feeds. It allows you to find and read stories, multimedia articles and photos directly in your browser.
Made with love by the AFP Dataviz team, based on an original idea from the Medialab. Data is provided by the AFP Content API.
about.quota-estimate-persistent: You're using {usage} of {quota} of persistent storage.
about.quota-estimate-temporary: You're using {usage} of {quota} of temporary storage.

not-authenticated.title: Log in to see the latest news
not-authenticated.external: If you don't work at AFP and you want to connect using a specific client id, {0}.
not-authenticated.afp: If you want to log in using your AFP account, {0}.

auth.cookies: By continuing your navigation on this site, you consent to the use of anonymous cookies for statistical purposes.

connectivity.message: Your device lost its internet connection.

tour.search:
Type your search terms here, then enter.

You can use conditional operatos like AND and OR, or search in specific fields using title:Worldcup by example
tour.products:
News, photos, graphics : decide what product you want.

When you're not logged in, you only view multimedia news wire from the previous day.
tour.languages:
6 languages are available. Select yours

Photos are only available in English
tour.urgencies: You can decide to display only important articles like alerts, flashes, or topshots for photos.
tour.date-picker:
Articles are sorted from the newest to the oldest.

Use this selector to search for a specific date.
tour.new: Click here to add a column and start a new search.
tour.authenticate: Log in with your AFP credentials to start reading the latest articles.

browser-warning.title: Warning
browser-warning.description: Your browser is not compatible with this app. Use a recent browser for an optimal experience.
